comment: If you try to upload a video using the editing feature, expect to try many, many, many, many times before it works. The app will crash repeatedly, and rarely saves your work. For being the biggest social media platform out there, it runs very poorly.
key sentence: Try to upload a video using the editing feature; the app crashes repeatedly and rarely saves your work.
the function of activity: This activity involves various tasks such as searching for contacts, playing, pausing, liking, sharing, and reporting videos, as well as managing user profiles and interactions(following list, follower, like,favorites,private,draft).
